title: Tony DiSpigna & Spencerian Script References?
content:
Hi all,

I'm working on a custom type project and am realizing I need some more reference material. Specifically, I'm looking for examples of Tony DiSpigna's work and his Spencerian Scripts such as this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131116164740im_/http:/typophile.com/files/herb_lubalin_063.jpg)

Can anyone point me to a website or PDF that I can study multiple examples of his work?
author: dave bailey

comments.content:
Here are some more examples.  
 [http://coopertypography.wordpress.com/2010/02/23/baseline-interview-with...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131116164740/http:/coopertypography.wordpress.com/2010/02/23/baseline-interview-with-tony-di-spigna/ "http://coopertypography.wordpress.com/2010/02/23/baseline-interview-with-tony-di-spigna/")

good luck!

(do post your result here!)

or, even better, contact him directly:

[http://iris.nyit.edu/finearts/faculty/adjunct/adispign.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131116164740/http:/iris.nyit.edu/finearts/faculty/adjunct/adispign.htm "http://iris.nyit.edu/finearts/faculty/adjunct/adispign.htm")
